prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that has a serene expression and a bell-shaped body.
I want a blue and white Pokemon with a unique musical theme and flowing features.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a wind chime, with gentle colors and a calming aura.
Make a small, ghostly Pokemon that floats and has a bell-like appearance with pink accents.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies tranquility with a bell structure and subtle shades of blue.
Design a Pokemon with a long, elegant body that has soothing colors and whimsical features.
Give me a creature that looks like a musical instrument, with a focus on soft colors and delicate details.
